Supplier.description: Company issuing the JSQI compliance declaration (header/footer or signature block).

MaterialName.description: Material/product name to which the JSQI statement applies.

MaterialCode.description: Material identifier/code if provided in the document.

IssueDate.description: Issue/publication date of the JSQI declaration.

IsJSQICompliant.description: True if the document explicitly states compliance with JSQI for cosmetic use (subject to use levels/category limits); False if non-compliance or no statement.

AnimalDerivedMaterials.description: True if the declaration indicates presence of animal-derived materials; False if explicitly none.

ProhibitedSubstancesPresent.description: True if the statement lists any JSQI-prohibited substances present; False if none are declared.

RestrictedSubstancesOverLimits.description: True if any JSQI-restricted substances are present above allowed limits; False if none above limits.
